abstract:
This is in response to IPC Interim Order # MO-3176-1 [PDF] and IPC Interim Order # MO-3248-1 [PDF] for disclosure of documents related to the construction of an arena in the City of Markham. Per the Interim Orders the following documents have been released:

  • 12-64 Record #1 January 2011 [PDF]
  • 12-64 Record #2 January 2011 [PDF]
  • 12-64 Record #3 February 2012 [PDF]
  • 12-64 Record #4 April 2012 [PDF]

This is in response to IPC Interim Order #MO-3177-1 [PDF] for disclosure of documents related to the construction of an arena in the City of Markham.

  • FOI 13-15 Redacted Record #3 [PDF]
  • FOI 13-15 Record #5 [PDF]
